contentBody.headMarkup:
<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/nqe5bux.css">

<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Light.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>
<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Regular.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>
<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Bold.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>

<!-- branding stylesheets -->
    
<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="{basePath}/assets/favicon.ico?{versionKey}">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{basePath}/assets/css/theme.css?{versionKey}">


<style>
    .header {
        position: relative !important;
    }
    
    :root {
        --dxp-s-section-columns-max-width: 1380px;
		--dxp-s-footer-content-max-width: 1380px;
		--dxp-s-header-content-max-width: 1380px;
    	}
        .slds-grid {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: flex;
            max-width: 1380px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
    /*:root {
    	--dxp-g-font-family-base: 'bree', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	} */
    	
    	.ff-profile-nav .menu-button {
            color: #123D64 !important;
        }

        .ff-profile-nav .slds-icon {
            fill: #123D64 !important;
        }
    	.ff-cart-link svg {
                --sds-c-icon-color-foreground-default: #123D64 !important;
         }
        @media screen and (max-width: 769px) {
			.ff-profile-nav .menu-button {
                color: #fbbf32;
            }

            .ff-profile-nav .slds-icon {
                fill:#fbbf32 !important;
            }
            .ff-mnav-mobile .slds-button.slds-button_icon {
                color: #fbbf32 !important;                
            }
            .ff-mnav-mobile .close-button .slds-button.slds-button_icon {
                color: #000000 !important;
            }
            .ff-cart-link svg {
                --sds-c-icon-color-foreground-default: #fbbf32 !important;
            }
            
        } 
        .ff-footer .footer {
            background-color: #123D64;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        .ff-footer-nav ul li a {
			color: #fff !important;
    		font-size: 1.125rem;
    		display: inline-block;
			margin-bottom: 25px;
        }
    	.ff-footer-address, .ff-footer-address a  {
            color: #ffffff !important;        
    	}
        .ff-social-menu img {
            width: auto;
            height: 18px !important;
            padding: 0 10px;
			transition: color .15s ease-in-out,background-color .15s ease-in-out,border-color .15s ease-in-out;
        }
        .slds-button.dxp-button-large {
            border-radius: 20px;
        }
    
    a {
        color: #1C75BC;
    }
    
    .brand-block {
     border-radius: 18px;
     padding: 3.5rem;
     margin: auto; 
     max-width: 1380px;
     width: 100%;
    }
    
    .pale-blue-bg {
     background-color: #EDF7FE;
    }
    
    .pale-butter-bg {
     background-color: #FFFBF2;
    }
    .ppp-link {
     font-weight: 600;
     font-size: 18px;
     font-family: 'Bree';
    }
    
    .dxp-tab-bar-container p {
     font-weight: 600 !important;
     font-size: 1.125rem !important;
     font-family: 'Bree' !important;
     color: #1C75BC !important;
    }
    
    @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
     .dxp-tab-bar-container p {
	 font-size: 13px !important;	
        }
    }
    
    .dxp-tab-bar-container.full-width {
     display: flex;align-content;
     justify-content: space-evenly;   
    }
    
    .dxp-tab-bar-active-tab-horizontal {
    background-color: #E0F2FD !important;
    border-radius: 5px !important;

    }
    
    html {
    scroll-padding-top: 220px;
	}
    
    .mw-1380 {
     margin: auto; 
     max-width: 1380px;
     width: 100%;
    }
    
    .logos-creds .card-image {
        object-fit: contain !important;
    }
    
    .button-row .columns-content {
     max-width: 50%;
     margin: auto;
    }
    .ff-product-filter .panel-wrapper > .panel-wrapper {
        background-color: #EDF7FE;
        padding: 15px;
        border-radius: 15px;
    }
    /* Enable text wrap on product titles in store*/
    .ff-product-results-grid .slds-truncate {
         max-width: 100%;
        overflow: visible;
        text-overflow: clip;
        white-space: normal;
        word-wrap: breakword;
        text-align: center;
    }
    /*Set height of product images  in store grid view*/
    .ff-product-results-grid img {
        max-height: 120px !important;
    }
    .ff-product-results-grid section .cardContainerGrid {
        min-height: 300px;
        border-radius: 15px;
        padding-top: 20px;        
    }
    .ff-product-results-grid lightning-formatted-rich-text.slds-rich-text-editor__output > span {        
        line-height: 1.2;
        font-size: 16px;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .ff-product-filter span.slds-m-left_x-small {
        color: #123d64;
    }
    .ff-product-filter span.slds-m-left_x-small:hover, .ff-product-filter span.slds-m-left_x-small:focus {
        text-decoration:underline;
    }
    
    /*button inside team overview flow */
    .ff-team-overview button.slds-button.slds-button_stateful.slds-button_neutral.slds-not-selected {
        color: #123d64;
        background-color: #fbbf32;
        border: none;
    }
    /*my account page*/
    .ff-account-details article.slds-card {
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
        border: none;
        border-radius: 15px;
    }    
    c-b2b-account-code.ff-account-code > div {
        padding: 35px 25px 25px;
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
        border-radius: 15px;
    }
    /*my orders page*/
    c-b2b-order-history-list .slds-grid.slds-wrap.slds-align_absolute-center {
        padding: 25px;
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
        border-radius: 15px;
    }
     c-b2b-historical-orders-list .slds-grid.slds-wrap.slds-align_absolute-center {
        padding: 25px;
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
        border-radius: 15px;
    }
    dxp_flow-flow.component-wrapper-spacer.ff-account-details {
        padding: 25px;
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
        border-radius: 25px;
    }
    .ff-account-details flowruntime-flow {
        background-color: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5);
    }
    /*address page*/
	.ff-address-list .address-card-style-class {
        background: rgba(255, 239, 210, 0.5) !important;
        border: none !important;
        padding: 25px !important;
        border-radius: 15px !important;
    }


    
    .center-page {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
    	align-items: center;
    }
    
    .team-name p {
        font-family: 'bree';
        font-size: 24px;
    }
    
    .ffstore-link-desktop img, .ffstore-link-mobile img {
        border-radius: 15px;
    }
    .ffstore-link-mobile {
        display:none;
    }
    .ffstore-link-desktop {
        display:block;
    }
    @media screen and (max-width: 769px) {
        .ffstore-link-mobile {
            display:block;
        }
        .ffstore-link-desktop {
            display:none;
        }
        
    }
    
    
    
</style>
